successes.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre 3
successes.description: A wild, bloody comedy from the knife-wielding maniacs at 5secondfilms.com.

Pledges.description: Your name in the credits and a sincere thank you from us!

- Your name in the credits 
- The entire 5-Second Films YEAR 1 DRM Free Digital Download! Including the crazy college years!
IF YOU'VE ALREADY DONATED $5 OR MORE YOU WILL RECEIVE THIS NEW INCENTIVE, AUTOMATICALLY!
You'll get the entire "5-Second Films YEAR 2" Digital Download (DRM Free)! That's the first TWO YEARS of the website for your viewing pleasure.

Custom 5SF Description by Brian Firenzi! You send him your idea for a 5secondfilms, and Brian, who writes ALL the descriptions on the website, will write a description to go along with that 5SF. No, if you want us to shoot it, that reward is available a bit further down.
HD download (or SD if your internet sucks) of "DUDE BRO PARTY MASSACE 3" + Digital Cover Art.
(includes all previous rewards)
Digital Download of YEAR FOUR! That's every 5secondfilm from YEARS 1, 2, 3 + 4! (DRM Free) (includes all previous rewards)

Digital Download of YEAR FIVE! That's ALL 5 years of the website (we're still in year 5 RIGHT NOW, so this download will include films up to October 30, 2013) (DRM Free) (includes all previous rewards).
THE BRO-TERIAN COLLECTION: Includes an HD (or SD) download, with behind the scenes footage AND Digital Cover Art of all three "Dude Bro" films--keep in mind films #1 & #2 don't actually exist!
(includes all previous rewards)

You get a "Bro-terion Collection" DVD or Blu Ray. It will have all the awesome behind-the-scenes and extra features of the digital Bro-terian Collection, except THIS one you can hold in your hands, play in your DVD/Blu Ray machine and display in your home to make all your friends jealous of how rad you are. (includes all previous rewards).

EXCLUSIVE NEW PRIZE: You'll get ONE ticket to the unprecedented 5secondfilms LIVE Stream-A-Thon on June 20th, 2013. This is a live event, produced by and starring the whole 5sf cast/crew, PLUS special guests, stand-up comedy, music, live contests and more!
If you can get yourself to The YouTube Studios in Playa Vista, CA on June 20th (travel ain't included), then YOU can be one of 20 lucky people who get to attend the live event.
Plus you'll get the entire digital Bro-terian Collection download listed above (includes the film, tons of behind the scenes featurettes and extras, plus digital artwork).
We'll send you CREASED 11x17 KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE posters of DBPM 1, 2 and 3!!!!
(includes all previous rewards).
You will get ALL FIVE YEARS worth of films from 5secondfilms.com in a special edition Blu-Ray or DVD that packed with extra features. And there's only 50 of them available.
You get the Kickstarter Exclusive DBPM3 Erotic  playing cards!!
(includes all previous rewards)
THE BRO-TERIAN COLLECTION: SPECIAL EDITION: All previous rewards, PLUS you get a Blu Ray or DVD of "The Bro-Terian Collection" that's AUTOGRAPHED by the members of 5sf!!!
The T-Shirt of your choosing--either a KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Dude Bro Party T-Shirt or 5secondfilms (includes all previous rewards).
WE WILL MAKE YOUR 5SECONDFILM.
That idea you've had for a long time that you really want us to make...we'll make it.

Obviously you get full credit for writing it and we'll communicate with you through the whole process.  We're cool like that and we love our fans and contributors!! We'll shoot it and act in it and edit it and put it on our website and youtube account (includes all previous awards).
We'll make you a rare VHS copy of DUDE BRO PARTY MASSACRE 3 with customized cover art! (includes all previous rewards)
A prop from DBPM3 OR a 5sf. And it won't be a blood-stained t-shirt. It's a cool prop. For example, THE ORIGINAL GORLAC MASK!

You become an Honorary Jr. Deputy with the Chico County Police. You get a Certificate, a personal message from Chicoâ€™s own Officer Sminkle, Chico Police shirt, Activity Book (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

You get a copy of the full script for DUDE BRO PARTY MASSACRE 3, signed by all 5sf writers. And, provided you can fly, drive or swim there yourself, you'll get an invitation to the premiere! (includes all previous non-limited rewards)
You get a personalized video message from 5sf's very own SATAN!!! (includes all previous non-limited rewards.)
Pick YOUR FAVORITE 5sf character and they will make you a personalized video or outgoing voicemail. (Includes all previous non-limited rewards.)
You get credited in the film as a Co-Broducer! (Includes all previous non-limited rewards.)
